name: Bubu a Metroidvania (VimJam 3)
description:
In this game you play as BUBU, a chicken trying to find the four special Items. Its quite short but was fun to make. Yo, this is my second game jam. I tried to get it embedded but was unable to.

Important Notes

Pumpkins are checkpoints in this game, so throw eggs to destroy them

If touching an X  press jump to jump off of it

Controls 

WASD or Arrows to Move

Spacebar to jump

J to shoot (also to get through dialogue box)

K to interact with doors

L to run

I to throw shoe

RightShift is Pause (Pausemenu is a bit buggy)

Backspace is return to menu

Credits

Everything was made by me
